If you've ever struggled to bring your clients to the center of your work or effectively assess your landscape without draining resources, this class is for you.?TYTHE will teach our go-to methods to learn about the people you serve or sell to, including who they are, what they're affected by, and who influences them.  Design thinking is a multidisciplinary, people-centered process that encourages empathy with your clients or community, experimentation with solutions, and design outcomes that match human needs. After years of integrating the design thinking methodology into our daily work,? TYTHEdesign ?has developed? Community Capacity Lab , a tailored class series focused on translating design theories across fields and sectors into real world, real work experience.  This class focuses on the people at the heart of yourk and is designed to be most beneficial for non-profits, city agencies, and service-based businesses.
